name: BreakFAST Go!
description: I am unsure if this works on apple or linux, but I know it works on windows and android.If anyone can test linux and/or apple it would be very much appreciated and if you do put in the comments. Coding was by aloelazoe . I used bitsy 3d to make it and here is the link to it: https://aloelazoe.itch.io/bitsy-3d.Movement is simple:WASD arrow keys or tapping on phone.
